note: Developer striving to avoid big tech & be green currently living in Brexitania and looking forward to getting an Irish passport so that I can travel & work from my Italian place whenever I like. I prefer to use only FOSS where possible and I dislike ads, surveillance capitalism and unaccountable big tech companies having visibility or control of my data. My main machine is a coreboot Debian laptop. My fairphone 3+ runs Ubuntu Touch.
